page.shortlink: api dotnet namespace saml utilities class
page.description: Retrieves the identity provider metadata from the identity provider.
page.prototype: dim cr as CallResult = ::DotNet::Saml::Utilities::FetchIdentityProviderMetadata(metadataURL as C)

argument.name: MetadataURL
argument.description: URL where the identity provider's metadata is stored.

return.name: cr
return.description: Returns a CallResult that contains whether the call was a success or not. On success ReturnDataValue will contain the XML. On failure Text contains the error message.
